department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系跨領域轉譯醫學博士班
department.en: PhD in Institute of Translational and Interdisciplinary Medicine

goal.ch: 本門課邀請授課醫師來自臺灣各大知名教學醫院與醫學中心，同時亦具有數學、訊號處理、計算機科學與數據應用等次領域研究專長。本門課本門課的主軸是以系統觀點量化健康和疾病狀態，希望提供以整體觀精神，精密量化方法，結合數學物理的新發展，來研究人體複雜系統機制，發展跨領域轉譯醫學的新道路。
goal.en: "In this class, we invite many renowned clinical doctors or professors from different top ranking medical centers or universities to share with us their experience on translational medicine.  A variety of topics will be covered in this class especially on the quantification of the systems under different clinical conditions.  Those topics will be reviewed and introduced in a holistic way and it helps the students to think out of the box when dealing with the clinical problems."

outline.ch:
"1. The latest update on medical internet of things)
2. An introduction on wearable physiological monitoring system)
3. Ontology & Abstraction of Healthcare Informatics for Workflow & Patient flow
4. Realizing Potential in Translational Medicine-from a simple idea to practice)
5. System biology on one chip
6. Cerebral Autoregulaltion
7. Precision health
8. Functional MRI in Task, Resting and Sleeping
9. Experience of ventricular arrhythmia signal analysis
10. Nonlinear analysis of biological signals: balance function as an example
11. 3D mapping and VT ablation
12. A complex neuromotory symptorn
13. Analysis of fMRI data"
